regex-tester.multilineTitle: Allows ^ and $ to match next to newline characters.
regex-tester.unicodeTitle: Unicode; treat a pattern as a sequence of Unicode code points.
regex-tester.unicodeSetsTitle: An upgrade to the u mode with more Unicode features.
regex-tester.noMatchDescription: The regular expression did not find any matches in the test text.
regex-tester.cardRegexDescription: Enter your regular expression pattern and configure matching flags.
regex-tester.cardFlagsDescription: Configure how the regular expression should match text.
regex-tester.cardTextDescription: Enter the text to match and view the results below.
regex-tester.cardMatchesDescription: View all matches found in the test text with their captures and groups.
regex-tester.cardSampleDescription: A randomly generated text that matches your regular expression pattern.
regex-tester.cardDiagramDescription: Visual representation of your regular expression pattern.
